thread.title: "Without Us, Your Country Is Paralyzed" - Undocumented Workers Plan Boycott "Day Without Immigrants"
thread.title_full: "Without Us, Your Country Is Paralyzed" - Undocumented Workers Plan Boycott "Day Without Immigrants"

author: Tyler Durden
title: "Without Us, Your Country Is Paralyzed" - Undocumented Workers Plan Boycott "Day Without Immigrants"
text:
by George Washington - Feb 15, 2017 4:54 PM 
ZOMG ... Shocking! by The_Real_Fly - Feb 15, 2017 8:58 AM 
The fight to isolate Trump has begun. BC Government’s Foreign Home Buyers Tax: Impact on Vancouver home prices by derailedcapitalism - Feb 15, 2017 1:37 PM 
Just about 6 months from when the BC government introduced its 15% property tax for foreign buyers of homes in Vancouver, the verdict is out. "Without Us, Your Country Is Paralyzed" - Undocumented Workers Plan Boycott "Day Without Immigrants" Feb 15, 2017 8:35 PM 0 SHARES 
As we noted over the weekend , one of the immediate consequences of the Trump immigration executive order - and one which has so far gone largely unchallenged - has been a crackdown against illegal immigrants residing in the US. Following reports that first surfaced over the weekend that US immigration officials had launched countrywide raids and arrested hundreds of illegal aliens across the nation as a result of that immigration executive order, President Trump weighed in on Twitter, stating that "the crackdown on illegal criminals is merely the keeping of my campaign promise. Gang members, drug dealers & others are being removed!" The crackdown on illegal criminals is merely the keeping of my campaign promise. Gang members, drug dealers & others are being removed! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 12, 2017 

But, as it turns out, the "undocumented immigrants" are not going down without a fight. 
Per a flyer that has been floating around the migrant farmworker community in California, illegal immigrants are planning "A Day Without Immigrants Boycott" for tomorrow . As part of the effort to demonstrate how vital illegal immigrants to the U.S. economy, "undocumented, residents, citizens, immigrants from all over the world" are encouraged to participate in the protest as follows: Do NOT attend work Do NOT open up our businesses Do NOT shop online or in stores Do NOT eat at restaurants Do NOT buy gas
